descriptions.direction: Located in Kunfunadhoo, Soneva Fushi is on a private beach. Kihaadhuffaru Island Pier and Thulhaadho Harbor are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Nelivaru Finolhu and Hibalhidoo. Discover the area's water adventures with windsurfing nearby, or enjoy the great outdoors with hiking/biking trails.
descriptions.general: General description: ?? Amenities: Recently renovated in 2017, the one-storey beach hotel has 61 rooms in total. It is equipped with a 24h reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, an air conditioning as well as a cinema. For the meals, there are 4 restaurants. In a total 3 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service and medical service are free of charge. For the laundry service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find a childrenÂ´s pool. Meals: ?? Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. A golf course is in the vicinity of the hotel. Spa area and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Child supervision: mini club for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English. Accepted methods of payment: American Express. Soneva Fushi FamilySuite (Private Pool - Domestic Flight): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Soneva Fushi FamilySuite (Private Pool - Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. TRANSFER OPTIONS MANDATORY FOR ALL THE GUESTS. SEAPLANE TRANSFER flying hours are restricted to daylight hours from 06:30 to 16:00 hrs only. Approx 30 minutes away from Male Airport. The standard permissible weight is 25 kg, which includes 20 kg of checked-in luggage and 5 kg of hand luggage per person. Guests arriving after 16:00 have an option to book Domestic or overnight accommodation (own expense) in close by hotel and will be transferred to resort the following day. DOMESTIC TRANSFER approx 25 minutes from Male to Dharavandhoo Airport, followed by 15 minutes transfer to the hotel by speedboat. ERRATA: Customer Information - Comment:Maldives Seaplane operates during daylight between 6:00hrs to 15:30hrs All intl. Arrival flights land after 15:00hrs & departure before 09:00hrs. Guests have to overnight in Male, Hulhumale or airport hotel and take flight on the next day. Rooms - Action:at annex; Comment:Any rooms available with more than 2 pax. Only 1 extra bed or Rollaway bed or sofa bed will be provided. No Rooms can accommodate more than 1 extra bed.

direction.text: Located in Kunfunadhoo, Soneva Fushi is on a private beach. Kihaadhuffaru Island Pier and Thulhaadho Harbor are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Nelivaru Finolhu and Hibalhidoo. Discover the area's water adventures with windsurfing nearby, or enjoy the great outdoors with hiking/biking trails.
